TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tausa, title = Tausa, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tausa} }

S.FORM: Tausa Itiniay i Zhuoxi Cen no Hualien ko Tausa a niyaro', 12 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 592 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 578 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq73%, Tayal10%, Amis2%, Bunun2%, Paiwan1%, Truku6%, roma5%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

Taosa Itiniay i Zhooxi Cen no Hoalien ko Taosa a niyaro', 12 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 592 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 578 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq73%, Tayal10%, Amis2%, Bonon2%, Paiwan1%, Troko6%, roma5%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
